publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2494 Nicola Sturgeon: Draft Mental Health (Absconding Patients from Other Jurisdictions) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Absconding patients from other jurisdictions) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Stewart Maxwell*

S3M-2494 Nicola Sturgeon: Draft Mental Health (Absconding patients from other jurisdictions) (Scotland) Regulations 2008—That the Health and Sport Committee recommends that the draft Mental Health (Absconding patients from other jurisdictions) (Scotland) Regulations 2008 be approved. Supported by: Shona Robison, Stewart Maxwell
